TITLE: You have completed your reply
RECEIVE_LIST: At least 2 weeks before your jury service starts, we'll send you:
RECEIVE_LIST_OB: At least 2 weeks before their jury service starts, we'll send the person you replied for:
RECEIVE_LIST_ADJUSTMENT: If you can do jury service, at least 2 weeks before it starts we'll send you:
RECEIVE_LIST_ADJUSTMENT_OB: If they can do jury service, at least 2 weeks before it starts we'll send them:
RECEIVE_LIST_ITEM_1: a letter confirming the date of your jury service
RECEIVE_LIST_ITEM_1_OB: a letter confirming the date of their jury service
RECEIVE_LIST_ITEM_2: an information pack about being a juror and the court you're going to
RECEIVE_LIST_ITEM_2_OB: an information pack about being a juror and the court they're going to
GETTING_READY: Get ready for your jury service
GETTING_READY_INFO: The information below is also in the email that we have sent you.
GETTING_READY_INFO_OB: The information below is also in the email that we have sent.
YOU_CAN_OB: You or the person you've replied for, can
WATCH_VIDEO_LINK: watch this video on YouTube about what happens when you're a juror
WATCH_VIDEO: , so you know what to expect. The video takes 13 minutes to watch.
WATCH_VIDEO_OB: , so they know what to expect. The video takes 13 minutes to watch.
WHAT_TO_EXPECT: , so you know what to expect.
WHAT_TO_EXPECT_OB: , so they know what to expect.
LEARN_MORE_LINK: Learn more about your jury service
CALCULATE_EXPENSES_LINK: Calculate what expenses and allowances you can claim
CALCULATE_EXPENSES_LINK_OB: Calculate what expenses and allowances you can claim
DOWNLOAD_A_COPY_3: of your summons reply for your records.
DOWNLOAD_A_COPY_3_OB: of the summons reply for your records.
SURVEY_LINK: What did you think of this service?
NO_ACTION: You do not need to do anything else.
ADJUSTMENT: We may get in touch to talk about the help you need so you can do jury service.
ADJUSTMENT_OB: We may get in touch to talk about the help they need so they can do jury service.
ADJUSTMENT_ALSO: We may get in touch to talk about the help you need so you can do jury service.
ADJUSTMENT_ALSO_OB: We may get in touch to talk about the help they need so they can do jury service.

HERO.YOUR_NUMBER_OB: The juror number of the person you have replied for is
HERO.GETTING_IN_TOUCH: If we get in touch with you, you may need to give your juror number. It's also on the letter we sent you.
HERO.GETTING_IN_TOUCH_OB: If we get in touch with them, they may need to give their juror number. It's also on the letter we sent them.
HERO.EMAIL_SUMMONS: We have sent you an email to say you have replied to your jury summons.
HERO.EMAIL_SUMMONS_OB: We have sent an email to say you have replied to this jury summons.
HERO.OPEN_REPLY: You can open, and then print or save a copy of your summons reply for your records.
HERO.OPEN_REPLY_ASSISTIVE: If you use assistive technology, such as a screen reader, you may prefer your copy as HTML.
HERO.OPEN_PDF_HIDDEN: Download a copy of your jury summons reply as a PDF (65KB)
HERO.OPEN_HTML_HIDDEN: Download a copy of your jury summons reply as HTML (15KB)
HERO.OPEN_PDF: Download a copy of your summons reply PDF (65KB)
HERO.OPEN_HTML: Download a copy of your summons reply HTML (15KB)

AGE.DISQUALIFICATION: Your age means you cannot do jury service
AGE.DISQUALIFICATION_OB: The age of the person you have replied for means they cannot do jury service
AGE.DOB_QUALIFICATION: By law, jurors must be at least 18 years old, and under 76 years old. You cannot do jury service because you will be younger than 18 or older than 75 on the date your jury service was due to start.
AGE.DOB_QUALIFICATION_OB: By law, jurors must be at least 18 years old, and under 76 years old. They cannot do jury service because they will be younger than 18 or older than 75 on the date their jury service was due to start.
AGE.NO_SERVICE_REQUIRED: We'll write to confirm that you do not have to do jury service. You do not need to do anything else.
AGE.NO_SERVICE_REQUIRED_OB: We'll write to confirm they do not have to do jury service. You do not need to do anything else.

DECEASED.REFERENCE: The juror number of the person you have replied for is
DECEASED.NO_ACTION: You do not need to do anything else
DECEASED.APOLOGY_INFO: Jurors are selected at random from the electoral roll. This is not always completely up to date. That's why we sent a jury summons to this person. We do apologise for this and hope it has not caused too much distress.

DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_LINE: We may get in touch to talk about the help you need so you can do jury service.
DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_LINE_OB: We may get in touch to talk about the help the person you replied for needs so they can do jury service.
DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE: We'll write to you within the next 7 days to let you know if you can change the date of your jury service.
DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_OB: We'll write to the person you're replying for within the next 7 days to let them know if they can change the date of their jury service.
DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_ADJUST: If you can do jury service, we'll write to you within the next 7 days to let you know if you can change the date.
DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_ADJUST_OB: If they can do jury service, we'll write to the person you replied for within the next 7 days to let you know if they can change the date.
DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_LIST_HEADER: Then, at least 2 weeks before your jury service starts, we'll send you:
DEFERRAL.NEXT_INFO_LIST_HEADER_OB: Then, at least 2 weeks before their jury service starts, we'll send them:
DEFERRAL.IF_YES: If you can do jury service, at least 2 weeks before it starts we'll send you:
DEFERRAL.IF_YES_OB: If they can do jury service, at least 2 weeks before it starts we'll send them:

EXCUSAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE: We'll write to you within the next 7 days to let you know if you must do jury service or if you can be excused.
EXCUSAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_OB: We'll write to the person you've replied for within the next 7 days to let them know if they must do jury service or if they can be excused.
EXCUSAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_ADJUST_1: We'll write to you within the next 7 days to let you know if you must do jury service or if you can be excused.
EXCUSAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_ADJUST_2: If you have asked to be excused because of a disability or impairment, we may get in touch to find out more.
EXCUSAL.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_ADJUST_OB: If you have asked for them to be excused because of a disability or impairment, we may get in touch to find out more.
EXCUSAL.NEXT_INFO_LIST_HEADER: If you must do jury service, at least 2 weeks before it starts we'll send you:
EXCUSAL.NEXT_INFO_LIST_HEADER_OB: If they must do jury service, at least 2 weeks before it starts we'll send them:
EXCUSAL.ADJUSTMENT: We may get in touch to talk about the help you need so you can do jury service.
EXCUSAL.ADJUSTMENT_OB: We may get in touch to talk about the help they need so they can do jury service.

INELIGIBLE.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_1: We'll now check your answers. Your answers might mean that you are not able to do jury service.
INELIGIBLE.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_2: We'll write to you in the next 7 days to let you know if you are able to do jury service.
INELIGIBLE.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_OB_1: We'll now check your answers. Your answers might mean that the person you've replied for is not able to do jury service.
INELIGIBLE.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_OB_2: We'll write to the person you replied for in the next 7 days to let them know if they are able to do jury service.
INELIGIBLE.NEXT_INFO_GUIDANCE_DEFERRAL_1: We'll now check your answers. Your answers might mean that you are not able to do jury service.
